pageTitle: We Don't Wipe : DPS : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (6) * Perhaps some minor cosmetic bugs. I really forget. Nothing remarkable. * Previously stuck on "Automatic" due to carelessness. * The range estimation now never tests spells, only items. It took me a long time of experimenting to get the distances right and to hunt down the items. * The tables of rotations, spells and actions have been edited to facilitate expansion as well as to protect against trampling on other add-ons due to shared naming. * The "Strictly no AoE" mode has been incorporated into the other modes, accessible by clicking on a key binding. * Elemental Shaman added ==== v1.01 * Split main file into several files to ease management * Minor bug fixes, too numerous to mention * More configuration options * More complicated rotations * Mini icons to display Interrupts/target dispel/player dispel/cooldowns * Fire Mages added * Arcane Mages added ==== v1.02 * Added debug code for a couple of very rare errors due to Blizzard returning nil data for an API call, one relating to the "charge" counts to the left of the main queue icon. * Fixed
